name: Monster Hatcher
description:
For the Godot Wild Jam #53!

A short pixel art game where you make strange creatures on a space station.

There is one Secret Ending.

See the info screen on the main menu for the game jam theme and the wild cards used along with the amount of unlockable creatures.

Credit to for stage song: 

LILA RAVELLE https://youtube.com/@lilaravelle7069

Credit to main menu and ending songs:

Sexualobster https://youtube.com/@SexuaLobster

Art by a beautiful friend:

Aura https://twitter.com/Auragedon?t=VNs_th4_MlhMoIM6SCWD-g&s=09
